sentences.en: Conclusion Self - made Jieyu Tang has good therapeutic effect on depressive neurosis.
sentences.cn: 结论自拟解郁汤治疗抑郁性神经症疗效显著.

sentences.en: For example: Angina Pectoris, Cardiac Neurosis, Congestive Heart failure and Heart Palpitations.
sentences.cn: 如: 心绞痛, 心脏神经症, 慢性充血性心力衰竭,心悸等.

sentences.en: He always projects his own neurosis onto his colleagues.
sentences.cn: 他自己有神经病,却老是认为他的同事们也有神经病.

sentences.en: He is majoring in the treatment of medical neurosis.
sentences.cn: 他主修的是神经官能症的治疗.

sentences.en: He may have some kind of neurosis or psychosis later in life.
sentences.cn: 他晚年可能患有某种神经症或精神病。

sentences.en: He was anxious to the point of neurosis.
sentences.cn: 他焦虑得都要得神经症了。

sentences.en: In that city there is neurosis in the air which the inhabitants mistake for energy.
sentences.cn: 在这座城市里流传着一种神经机能病,居民们都误认为是精力旺盛的表现.

sentences.en: Methods The effects of psychological nursing on neurosis were analysed retrospectively.
sentences.cn: 方法回顾性分析针对性心理护理对神经症患者康复的影响.

sentences.en: Neurosis essentially consists of stupid behavior by non - stupid people.
sentences.cn: 神经官能症本质上是由来自不愚蠢人的愚蠢行为组成的.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the effect of psychological direction on obsessional neurosis.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨心理疏导治疗强迫症的疗效观察.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the effective method for depressive neurosis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨抑郁性神经症有效治疗方法.

sentences.en: Objective To study curative effect of cognitive comprehend therapy of obsessive - compulsive neurosis.
sentences.cn: 目的了解认识领悟疗法对强迫症的疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To summarize the treatment and nursing of venereal neurosis.
sentences.cn: 目的总结对性病神经症患者的治疗护理措施和经验.

sentences.en: She got a neurosis about chemicals and imagined them everywhere doing her harm.
sentences.cn: 她对化学品有神经症，认为它们无处不在地伤害着自己。

sentences.en: Whatever they said , she could see no signs of a " neurosis. "
sentences.cn: 无论如何, 四小姐那全身的神情都不像有 神经病!

words.tran_cn: 神经系统科学（指神经病学、 神经化学等）
神经病患者；神经过敏者
神经质，[心理] 神经过敏症
[生理] 神经递质；[生理] 神经传递素

trans.tran_en: a mental illness that makes someone unreasonably worried or frightened
